sprint_goal: Establish the foundational backend, including the secure Jint execution engine, basic script persistence with encryption, and API access control.
Deliver the core administrator experience by building the rich script editor UI and the essential preview functionality for rapid development and debugging.
Implement critical change management and compliance features, including script versioning logic and a comprehensive, immutable audit trail for all sensitive operations.
Enhance the feature set with the versioning UI (diff/revert), operational monitoring via Prometheus, and advanced data validation rules to improve system robustness.
Prepare the feature for production rollout by creating migration tools, comprehensive documentation, and adding quality-of-life improvements like internationalization.
